Suyeon

Korean: 수연

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Han Su Yeon
Native name:
한수연
Birthday:
May 9, 1988
Age:
36 years old
Height:
5'6" (167 cm)
Weight:
105.8 lbs (48 kg)
Group (2005-2016):
LPG until Dec 31, 2012

Introduction

Suyeon is a South Korean singer. She was a member of the girl group LPG. She was a 2nd-generation member. She joined the group in 2009 and left in 2012. She is now a musical actress and supermodel.

Aquargo Entertainment:
